attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cornwall has the highest rate in England of MS sufferers, yet due to lack of government funding we are going to lose our MS nurse. We are struggling to fund through public donations, a Therapy Centre for Cornwall, which is deperately needed. Please help us fund the centre.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not just your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
